        <name>HR Entitlement - Carry Over User Overrid</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[try{
    gs.info("Fix Script: HR Entitlement - Carry Over User Override: started");
	getCoreCOEs();
	gs.info("Fix Script: HR Entitlement - Carry Over User Override: completed");
} catch (e) {
	gs.info("Fix Script: HR Entitlement - Carry Over User Override: exception: " + e);
}

function getCoreCOEs() {
	var grCOE = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_coe');
	if(grCOE.isValid()){
		grCOE.addQuery('user_override', true);
		grCOE.query();
		while(grCOE.next())
			updateEntitlement(grCOE.getValue('entitlement_id'), grCOE.active);
	}
}

function updateEntitlement(id, actv) {
	var grUA = new GlideRecord('ua_entitlement');
	if(grUA.get('id', id)){
		grUA.user_override = true;
		grUA.active = actv;
		grUA.update();
	}
}]]></script>
